languages.text: "Ты... Никчемный, спесивый и очень скоро мертвый мон-кай! Трибунал почти достиг завершения, и когда приговор будет вынесен, я выпотрошу твои внутренности и набью их плотоядными червями, а затем протащу по улицам..."

traits.locale_text: "Ты... Никчемный, спесивый и очень скоро мертвый мон-кай! Трибунал почти достиг завершения, и когда приговор будет вынесен, я выпотрошу твои внутренности и набью их плотоядными червями, а затем протащу по улицам..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."
languages.original_text: "Ты... Никчемный, спесивый и очень скоро мертвый мон-кай! Трибунал почти достиг завершения, и когда приговор будет вынесен, я выпотрошу твои внутренности и набью их плотоядными червями, а затем протащу по улицам..."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."

languages.text: « Espèce... de mon-keigh {mf|inutile, arrogant et bientôt mort|inutile, arrogante et bientôt morte} ! Le procès touche à sa fin, et lorsque le jugement sera rendu, je vous étriperai, je remplirai vos entrailles de vers carnassiers et je vous traînerai dans les rues... »
languages.original_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."

traits.locale_text: « Espèce... de mon-keigh {mf|inutile, arrogant et bientôt mort|inutile, arrogante et bientôt morte} ! Le procès touche à sa fin, et lorsque le jugement sera rendu, je vous étriperai, je remplirai vos entrailles de vers carnassiers et je vous traînerai dans les rues... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你……你这没用、傲慢的猴子，你马上就要死了！这场审判马上就结束了！等判决宣布之后，我会立刻把你开膛破肚，把你肚子里塞满吃肉的虫子，把你拖到街上……”
languages.original_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."

traits.locale_text: “你……你这没用、傲慢的猴子，你马上就要死了！这场审判马上就结束了！等判决宣布之后，我会立刻把你开膛破肚，把你肚子里塞满吃肉的虫子，把你拖到街上……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「この…役立たずで傲慢で、死に損ないのモン＝ケイめ！裁判はじきに終わる。そして判決が下されたら、お前の体からえぐり出したはらわたに肉食虫を詰めたあと、通りで引きずり回してやる…」
languages.original_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."

traits.locale_text: 「この…役立たずで傲慢で、死に損ないのモン＝ケイめ！裁判はじきに終わる。そして判決が下されたら、お前の体からえぐり出したはらわたに肉食虫を詰めたあと、通りで引きずり回してやる…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr ... {mf|Nutzloser, arroganter und bald toter|Nutzlose, arrogante und bald tote} Chem-Pan-Sey! Der Prozess ist bald vorbei und nach Verkündigung des Urteils werde ich Euch aufreißen, Eure Eingeweide mit fleischfressenden Würmern füllen und Euch dann durch die Straßen zerren ..."
languages.original_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr ... {mf|Nutzloser, arroganter und bald toter|Nutzlose, arrogante und bald tote} Chem-Pan-Sey! Der Prozess ist bald vorbei und nach Verkündigung des Urteils werde ich Euch aufreißen, Eure Eingeweide mit fleischfressenden Würmern füllen und Euch dann durch die Straßen zerren ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡Tú... inútil, arrogante y muy pronto difunto mon-keigh! El juicio está a punto de concluir, y cuando se dicte sentencia te voy a rajar el vientre, te llenaré las tripas de gusanos carnívoros y te arrastraré por las calles...».
languages.original_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Tú... inútil, arrogante y muy pronto difunto mon-keigh! El juicio está a punto de concluir, y cuando se dicte sentencia te voy a rajar el vientre, te llenaré las tripas de gusanos carnívoros y te arrastraré por las calles...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Seni işe yaramaz, kendini beğenmiş, ölümü fermanı imzalı mon-keigh! Mahkeme sona ermek üzere. Hüküm verildikten sonra karnını deşip bağırsaklarını etobur solucanlarla dolduracağım, sonra da cesedini sokaklarda sürükleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "You... useless, arrogant, soon-to-be dead mon-keigh! The trial is almost complete, and when the judgement is pronounced, I will gut you, fill your bowels with flesh-eating worms, and drag you through the streets..."

traits.locale_text: "Seni işe yaramaz, kendini beğenmiş, ölümün eşiğindeki mon-keigh! Mahkeme sona ermek üzere ve hüküm verildikten sonra iç organlarını deşeceğim, bağırsaklarını etobur solucanlarla dolduracağım ve seni sokaklarda sürükleyeceğim".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
